name: Nothing More
description:
You've moved to a new home in a new town and things already seem to be off.

You'll have to manage your flashlights battery and your sanity if you want to survive your new home.

We hope you enjoy the demo, We're about half way finished with the game and making good progress!

We also have a Patreon if you want to send us a motivational coffee! https://www.patreon.com/hippocat?fan_landing=true&view_as=public

Thanks for playing our game!

The Demo is still subject to change.

Controls:

Keyboard:

Arrow keys to move

Z or Enter to interact

X or Esc to cancel or open menu

Pc controller:

Left thumb stick or D-pad to move

A button to interact

B button  to cancel 

Y button to open menu
